description: Currently, a request to get/set metadata on /v1.1/servers/3/meta will succeed when a server with id 3 does not exist. This should return a 404.
title: OSAPI: metadata can be set on a server that does not exist

comments.content: Currently, a request to get/set metadata on /v1.1/servers/3/meta will succeed when a server with id 3 does not exist. This should return a 404.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~bcwaldon
